SEARCH
Package com.icx.dom.domain.sql.tools

Class Java2Sql

java.lang.Object
com.icx.common.base.Common
com.icx.dom.jdbc.JdbcHelpers
com.icx.dom.domain.sql.tools.Java2Sql
public abstract class Java2Sql extends JdbcHelpers
Java program to generate SQL scripts for generation of persistence database using defined domain classes - for Domain persistence mechanism.

Copy Java2Sql.java into domain package of application (where all domain classes must reside) and start it there without parameters (before starting you may have to change the package in the first line of code).

Java2Sql generates three SQL table generation scripts: create_ms_sql.sql, create_mysql.sql and create_oracle.sql in directory sql parallel to src.

Java2Sql supports version control: Using annotations DomainAnnotations.Created, DomainAnnotations.Changed, DomainAnnotations.Removed the product versions where domain classes and/or single fields were created, changed or removed can be defined. Java2Sql then produces additional database update scripts for any product version defined in one of these annotations.
